awd_titl_txt: Examine the Use of Effectiveness of Technology in Teaching  Science and Mathematics
awd_abstract_narration: This planning proposal seeks to enhance the use of                              technology in the science and mathematics classroom.  More                      specifically, the project seeks to do the following:  to                        examine how and which technological innovations are being                       used in the teaching of science and mathematics; to examine                     how technology is being used to link scientists, science and                    mathematics educators, and other professionals together; to                     determine what has worked, how well and why; and to explore                     new advances in technology that have implications for                           education.  As a result of the findings, a teacher                              enhancement program will be designed for grades K-12 for                        effective use of technology in the teaching of science and                      mathematics.
org_div_long_name: Division of Research on Learning in Formal and Informal Settings (DRL)
